Stranger

Dec 11, 2015

There’s an art gallery on Newbury called Know No Truth.

Landon Richmond, the artist, is fantastic – at first glance, his art is a little creepy, a little dark. I’ve noticed the pieces usually have a specific theme/purpose (here’s a favorite).

They also have art gallery receptions occasionally! In this one (titled Stranger), they were showing a visiting artist’s prints.

I actually got a print for free:

  • Asra Ali
  • May 30, 2015
